message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15,000. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,500?
